Bibliographic References: LCS, Suppl. I, p. 38, no. 44a, pi. 8,3
Imagery Description: (a) Dionysiac procession, moving to left—maenad with torch in each hand, bearded silen with wineNon Sepcifiedskin on his shoulders, Dionysos with cithara, and young satyr playing the flute, (b) young satyr, with outstretched arms, pursuing woman, moving to right and looking back left
